Package Student

Class SwapIndex

java.lang.Object
Student.SwapIndex
public class SwapIndex
extends java.lang.Object
SwapIndex swaps the indexes of a course between 2 students.
Author:
1 Esmond Heng Fuwei, 2 Samantha Tan Swee Yun

    • swapIndex

      public static void swapIndex​(java.util.ArrayList studentsRecords, java.util.ArrayList courseRecordList, java.lang.String MatricNum, java.lang.String oldIndexNum, java.lang.String newIndexNum, java.lang.String key) throws java.io.IOException
      swaps the indexes of a course between 2 students.
      Parameters:
      studentsRecords - An ArrayList of StudentRecords currently in the database
      courseRecordList - An ArrayList of courseRecord currently in the database
      MatricNum - friend's MatricNum
      oldIndexNum - user's IndexNum
      newIndexNum - friend's IndexNum
      key - The key used to identify the user
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - IOException If an input or output exception occurs
